description: Returns a list of metric streams in this account.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token that marks the start of the next batch of returned results. You can use this token in a subsequent operation to get the next batch of results.

nested_items.name: Entries
nested_items.description: The array of metric stream information.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the metric stream.

nested_items.name: CreationDate
nested_items.description: The date that the metric stream was originally created.

nested_items.name: LastUpdateDate
nested_items.description: The date that the configuration of this metric stream was most recently updated.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the metric stream.

nested_items.name: FirehoseArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Kinesis Firehose devlivery stream that is used for this metric stream.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The current state of this stream. Valid values are running and stopped.

nested_items.name: OutputFormat
nested_items.description: The output format of this metric stream. Valid values are json, opentelemetry1.0, and opentelemetry0.7.
